hep.io.root.interfaces
Interface RootObject

All Known Subinterfaces:
TArray, TArrayC, TArrayD, TArrayF, TArrayI, TAttAxis, TAttFill, TAttLine, TAttMarker, TAxis, TBranch, TBranchClones, TBranchElement, TBranchObject, TCollection, TDirectory, TFile, TGraph, TH1, TH1D, TH1F, TH2, TH2D, TH2F, TKey, TLeaf, TLeafB, TLeafC, TLeafElement, TLeafF, TLeafI, TLeafObject, TLeafS, TList, TNamed, TObject, TSeqCollection, TStreamerBase, TStreamerBasicPointer, TStreamerBasicType, TStreamerElement, TStreamerInfo, TStreamerObject, TStreamerObjectAny, TStreamerObjectPointer, TStreamerString, TString, TTree
All Known Implementing Classes:
RootFileReader
public interface RootObject

A basic interface implemented by all root objects. Not to be confused with TObject which is only implemented by some root objects.

Version:
$Id: RootObject.java,v 1.5 2002/06/12 23:15:13 duns Exp $
Author:
Tony Johnson (tonyj@slac.stanford.edu)

Method Detail

rootClass

public RootClass rootClass()
Returns the class name of this object

getValue

public Object getValue(String member)
Returns the value of a named member variable. Searches in this class or any of its super classes. The value returned will be either
  1. A RootObject
  2. A java.lang.reflect.Array
  3. A Java Object representing a primitive type (int, double etc).

    4. See Also:
    RootObject, Array
